column4: Would anyone be willing to give me a quick instruction on the use of sed/awk?
#sed and #awk are probably better channels for related questions.  But you can try here too, just be more specific
just so I know, is the command ops or "op"
you did it correctly, though both may work.  ubotu is just sleeping...
no need for recursive, just setting HOME to that would work
but then someone can do 'less /home/user/.gaim/accounts.xml' and check out his password ;)
make a directory 700 and try to read the contents of a file inside with another user
that's interesting... I _know_ that used to work
only if you have execute permissions on the directory
ahh, interesting.  I was under the mistaken impression that execute only affect directory listing
read permissions let you list contents and execute lets you cd in (as I remember)
